## Relationships between types of convergence

* If $X_n \overset{a.s.}{\to} X$, then $X_n \overset{p}{\to} X$
* If $X_n \overset{p}{\to} X$, then $X_n \overset{d}{\to} X$
* If $X_n \overset{d}{\to} c$, where $c$ is a constant, then $X_n \overset{p}{\to} c$

## Practice question

Suppose that $X_1, X_2, ... \overset{iid}{\sim} Uniform(0, 1)$. Then $X_{(n)} \overset{p}{\to} 1$.
